title: MLOps with Databricks and MLflow
description: Learn how to productionize machine learning models on Databricks using MLflow for experiment tracking and model deployment.
short_description: Ship reliable ML pipelines with Databricks and MLflow.
prerequisites_titles: Introduction to Python; Machine Learning for Everyone

title: Building LLM Apps with ChatGPT and dbt
description: Build robust LLM-powered data apps by combining ChatGPT, SQL models, and dbt for analytics engineering.
short_description: Design and deploy LLM analytics apps with dbt.

title: Productionizing Generative AI on Vertex AI
description: Take your GenAI prototypes to production using Google Cloud Vertex AI, pipelines, and monitoring best practices.
short_description: Operationalize GenAI workloads on Vertex AI.
tracks_titles: MLOps Engineer in Python (Incremental); LLM Applications Specialist (Incremental)

title: Monitoring Data Quality for MLOps Pipelines
description: Monitor data quality, drift, and model performance across ML pipelines using modern observability tools.
short_description: Detect data issues early in your MLOps workflows.
prerequisites_titles: Data Quality Fundamentals; MLOps with Databricks and MLflow
